subject: College Athletics
Decisions and Verdicts
Basketball (College)
Gambling
lead_paragraph: After a federal judge’s ruling on betting, the N.C.A.A. lifted a recent ban against New Jersey colleges, allowing them to host tournament games or championships.
snippet: After a federal judge’s ruling on betting, the N.C.A.A. lifted a recent ban against New Jersey colleges, allowing them to host tournament games or championships.
